blogPost.excerpt: Handoff Helpers is a free component library that helps you effectively communicate your designs 💪 —— It includes components like: - Prototype Table of Contents - Link trees - To-do lists - All kinds of organizers - Status indicators - and more!
blogPost.body: Handoff Helpers is a free component library that helps you effectively communicate your designs 💪 —— It includes components like: - Prototype Table of Contents - Link trees - To-do lists - All kinds of organizers - Status indicators - and more!
blogPost.title: Handoff Helpers - Free Figma library to make designers better communicators
blogPost.author: Michael Riddering

localize.description: Handoff Helpers是一个免费的组件库，可以帮助你有效地沟通你的设计💪 --它包括的组件有。- 原型目录--链接树--待办事项列表--各种组织者--状态指示器--等等!
localize.tagline: 免费的Figma库让设计师成为更好的沟通者

localize.description: Handoff Helpers是一個免費的組件庫，可以幫助你有效地溝通你的設計💪 --它包括的組件有。- 原型目錄--鏈接樹--待辦事項列表--各種組織者--狀態指示器--等等!
localize.tagline: 免費的Figma庫讓設計師成爲更好的溝通者

previous.excerpt: Want to grow your startup? GrowthHackAI is a GPT-3 powered tool that will help you find the perfect growth strategies that will take your business to the next level. 100% Free. No Signup Required.
previous.title: Growth Hack AI - Free GPT-3 powered growth strategies to boost your startup

localize.description: 想让你的初创企业成长？GrowthHackAI是一款由GPT-3驱动的工具，它将帮助你找到完美的增长策略，使你的业务更上一层楼。100%免费。无需注册。
localize.tagline: 免费的GPT-3驱动的增长策略来促进你的创业公司

localize.description: 想讓你的初創企業成長？GrowthHackAI是一款由GPT-3驅動的工具，它將幫助你找到完美的增長策略，使你的業務更上一層樓。100%免費。無需註冊。
localize.tagline: 免費的GPT-3驅動的增長策略來促進你的創業公司

next.excerpt: Newny is a Live Q&A, Feedback and Insights tool made for organisations that use webinars, workshops and other forms of virtual events as a customer engagement channel.
next.title: Newny - Live Q&A, feedback and Insights tool for virtual events

localize.description: Newny是一款实时问答、反馈和见解工具，适用于使用网络研讨会、研讨会和其他形式的虚拟活动作为客户参与渠道的组织。
localize.tagline: 虚拟活动的现场问答、反馈和洞察工具

localize.description: Newny是一款實時問答、反饋和見解工具，適用於使用網絡研討會、研討會和其他形式的虛擬活動作爲客戶參與渠道的組織。
localize.tagline: 虛擬活動的現場問答、反饋和洞察工具
